snippet: The lawsuit charges that prisoners are routinely executed using “a secret drug formulation obtained from secret sources,” denying the public its rightful access to important information about the criminal justice system.
abstract: Group of news organizations is suing Missouri Department of Corrections, arguing that department is violating First Amendment by refusing to identify sources of lethal drugs used in its executions.
lead_paragraph: The lawsuit charges that prisoners are routinely executed using “a secret drug formulation obtained from secret sources,” denying the public its rightful access to important information about the criminal justice system.

headline.main: News Groups Sue for Data on Missouri’s Executions
headline.print_headline: News Groups Sue for Data on Missouri’s Executions
